plot: A timid man arrives at his local grocery store beginning the first mundane task of his long, monotonous day only to unexpectedly bump into the girl of his dreams.
title: You Only Meet a Stranger Once
plot_es: A timid man arrives at his local grocery store beginning the first mundane task of his long, monotonous day only to unexpectedly bump into the girl of his dreams.
original_name: You Only Meet a Stranger Once
plot_en: A timid man arrives at his local grocery store beginning the first mundane task of his long, monotonous day only to unexpectedly bump into the girl of his dreams.
